byline.original: By LAURA TACH and KATHRYN EDIN

lead_paragraph: Low-wage workers with kids know that tax season brings a huge boost.
snippet: Low-wage workers with kids know that tax season brings a huge boost.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Profs Laura Tach and Kathryn Edin observes that tax season provides boon to some 27 million low-wage Americans who qualify for earned-income tax credit; praises program that puts much-needed money in hands of families needing it most, and offers evidence funds are spent wisely and can help lift children out of poverty; challenges critics of program, arguing they fail to see how it builds dignity as well as needed cash.
